meanings.definition: A harmony of the Gospels in which the text of each Gospel is presented in a separate column.
meanings.english_definition: A harmony of the Gospels in which the text of each Gospel is presented in a separate column.

examples.sentence: The Hypodiatessaron is a useful tool for comparing the accounts of the Gospels.
examples.translation: Hypodiatessaronは、福音書の記述を比較するための便利なツールです。

etymology.value: From Greek ὑπό (hypo, “under”) + διά (dia, “through”) + τέσσαρες (tessares, “four”) + -ον (-on, neuter suffix).
